hero.subtitle: Real-time voice interviews. No more typing.

interface.cameraOffHint: Click button below to turn on camera

analysis.subtitle: Your interviewer is an AI, but the feedback feels human. We analyze your delivery, not just your transcript.

nonVerbal.title: Non-Verbal Cues
nonVerbal.description: We track eye contact, posture, and facial reliability using privacy-friendly face mesh technology.

tone.title: AI-Powered Feedback
tone.description: Get detailed AI analysis after your interview, including strengths, areas for improvement, and an overall performance score.

context.title: Model Answer Generation
context.description: AI generates personalized model answers based on your resume and job description for each question.

home.title: AI Interview Practice Platform
home.subtitle: Practice behavioral interviews with AI to improve your interview skills

features.voiceDesc: Have real voice conversations with AI interviewer
features.videoDesc: Turn on camera to practice eye contact and body language
features.feedbackDesc: Get AI analysis and suggestions on your interview performance

interview.title: Interview Practice

setup.title: Interview Setup
setup.subtitle: Configure your interview settings before starting
setup.languageDescription: Choose the language for your interview session
setup.jdDescription: Add a job description to get more relevant interview questions tailored to the position
setup.startHint: You can start the interview even without adding a job description

guestWarning.title: Continue as Guest?
guestWarning.message: You are not logged in. As a guest, you will NOT be able to save your interview or receive AI analysis reports. For the best experience, we recommend logging in first.

setup.resumeDescription: Upload your resume to get more personalized interview questions
setup.resumeLoginRequired: Log in to upload your resume

jd.urlDescription: Paste a job listing URL from 104 or 1111 to automatically parse the job description
jd.textDescription: Manually enter the job information you want to practice for
jd.descriptionPlaceholder: Paste or type the job description and requirements here...

errors.urlRequired: Please enter a job listing URL
errors.parseFailed: Failed to parse the job listing. Please try again or use manual input.

room.notSupportedMessage: Your browser does not support voice features. Please use the latest version of Chrome or Edge.

video.cameraOffHint: Click button below to turn on camera

room.caption: AI Captions

interview.preparingDescription: Please wait, the interview will begin shortly
interview.readyDescription: Click the button below to start the interview

saveDialog.title: Save Interview Record
saveDialog.analysisNotice: AI will analyze your answers and generate model responses (takes 10-20 seconds)
saveDialog.savingNotice: AI is generating analysis and model responses...
saveDialog.errorRetry: Please try again or contact support.
saveDialog.loginRequiredMessage: Please login to save your interview and receive analysis.
saveDialog.cannotSaveMessage: Saving and AI analysis features require login. This interview record cannot be saved. For the best experience, please login before your next interview.

auth.loginToAccess: Please login to access this page

login.subtitle: Sign in to start your interview practice
login.termsHint: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

history.title: Interview History
history.subtitle: View your past interview records and feedback
history.emptyDescription: Your interview records will appear here after completing your first interview

transcript.title: Transcript
transcript.viewFullTranscriptDescription: View main transcript and compare with model answers

history.transcriptionDisclaimer: The transcript was generated by real-time speech-to-text and may contain some transcription errors. This does not affect the AI analysis results.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Interview Record
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this interview record? This action cannot be undone.

analyzing.title: Analyzing your interview performance...
analyzing.description: AI is evaluating your responses and generating scores and feedback

resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: Upload your resume to get personalized interview questions

errors.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload a PDF, JPG, or PNG file.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {maxSize}.
errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload resume. Please try again.

errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred, please try again later
errors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to perform this action
errors.NOT_FOUND: The requested resource was not found
errors.AUDIO_PERMISSION_DENIED: Microphone permission denied. Please allow microphone access to continue
errors.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Server error occurred, please try again later
errors.BAD_GATEWAY: Unable to connect to service, please try again later
errors.SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE: Service temporarily unavailable, please try again later
errors.NETWORK_ERROR: Network connection failed, please check your internet connection
